title: Automatically generate @importFrom roxygen tags
text: importing functions use package, choice @import pkg import whole package @importFrom pkg fun1 fun2 import functions. @importFrom syntax preferable, stressed importing whole packages “makes code harder read (can’t tell function coming ), @import many packages, increases chance function name conflicts.” R Packages (2e) guidelines say two reasonable locations @importFrom : close possible usage external function. mindset, place @importFrom roxygen comment function package use external function. central location. approach keeps @importFrom tags together, dedicated section package-level documentation file (can created usethis::use_package_doc()). find first option much clearer, , warn, tends get tedious keep track function calls. Therefore, autoimport parse code, detect functions import, add right @importFrom tags right place. Just like !

title: Automatically compute @importFrom tags — autoimport
text: root Path root package. files Files read. Default R/ folder. namespace_file Path NAMESPACE file description_file Path DESCRIPTION file use_cache Whether use cache system. Can "read" "write". ignore_package Whether ignore files ending -package.R verbose higher, output printed. May slow process bit.
